Our Story From Struggle to System

How two producers with opposite approaches created a methodology that transforms anyone into a professional

01

The Beginning

When "Good Ears" Weren't Enough

I'll be honest with you – I was never the "naturally gifted" producer in the room.

While my friends seemed to nail perfect mixes by pure intuition, I'd spend hours tweaking EQs and compressors, only to end up with tracks that sounded... amateur. Watching them work felt like witnessing magic I'd never possess.

But here's what I discovered: being the "untalented" one was actually my greatest advantage.

02

The Breakthrough

When I Stopped Trusting My Ears

After years of frustration, I had a revelation. Instead of trying to develop "golden ears" like everyone said I needed, I started asking a different question:

"What if I could reverse-engineer the exact techniques used in professional tracks?"

This led me down a path that would change everything. Using AI stem separation technology and analytical tools, I began deconstructing hit records with surgical precision.

The results were immediate and undeniable. My productions started matching the quality of tracks I'd been studying.

03

Enter Conro

The Missing Piece

Conor: Creative
Eric: Analytical

That's when I met Conor Patton (Conro) – a producer who embodied everything I wasn't. Where I was analytical, he was intuitive. Where I relied on tools, he trusted his vibe.

With over 250 million Spotify streams and Billboard charting hits, Conor represented the "naturally gifted" producer I'd always envied.

But here's what surprised me: Conor was fascinated by my systematic approach. He realized that while his intuition got him far, my methodical reverse-engineering techniques could take his productions to an entirely new level.

Together, we created something neither of us could achieve alone – a complete system that combines analytical precision with musical intuition.

04

The Technical Wizard

Adding BigJerr

As our methodology evolved, we realized we needed someone who could help students implement these advanced techniques seamlessly. Enter Jerry DiPhillippo (BigJerr) – one of only 380 Ableton Certified Trainers worldwide.

Jerry isn't just technically brilliant; he's taught industry legends like Andre3000, Kompany, and Slander. With over 20 years of teaching experience, he has a unique gift for making complex production concepts accessible to anyone.

Jerry handles our Elite tier 1-on-1 coaching sessions, ensuring every student can execute at a professional level.

05

The Final Challenge

Quality Vocals

As our students' productions reached commercial quality, we hit an unexpected roadblock. Their instrumentals were label-ready, but finding professional-quality vocals was nearly impossible.

That's when we brought in Colton Avery – a songwriter with over 150 million streams who's written for Alan Walker, Cheat Codes, and Far East Movement.

Now, every Elite tier student receives a custom topline from Colton, ensuring their final tracks have the vocal quality to match their production excellence.

06

Our Mission

Democratizing Professional Production

We're not here to gatekeep the "secrets" of professional production. We're here to systematize them.

Our story proves that you don't need to be born with "golden ears" to create professional music. You don't need decades of trial and error. You need the right system, the right mentors, and the right tools.

Don't Let Your Tracks Stay "Almost There"

Get the precise analysis that reveals what separates bedroom demos from chart hits.

Why We're Different

Active Industry Professionals

Proven Results

Our approach works because it's born from necessity, refined through real-world application, and proven by the success of our students who've achieved everything from 900K monthly Spotify listeners to major label deals.

Current Methods, Current Results

We're sharing the cutting-edge systems we use today to create hits and work with major labels. This isn't theory – it's what's working right now in the industry.
